content:
# The error indicates that I cannot craft the Iron Gear Wheels because they require a specific crafting machine, which I currently do not have in my inventory or on the map.
# 
# This means I need to prioritize crafting a machine that can handle the crafting of these items. 
# 
# The most suitable option would be to craft a "Assembling Machine," as it can handle various recipes, including the Iron Gear Wheel and other components.
# 
# I will check the recipe for the Assembling Machine to see what materials are required.

assembling_machine_recipe = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.AssemblingMachine)  # Getting the recipe for the Assembling Machine.
assembling_machine_recipe  # Displaying the recipe details.
